text:
How we use Cookies; We use Cookies to help improve your experience whilst you are visiting our site.
We use Cookies to help understand anonymous usage of our site.
When you visit our web site, you may be providing us with information about your visit in two ways: Statistics collected as you browse Organisational and personal information you knowingly give us.
As you browse the site, our Web servers collect information about your visit, not about you personally.
To achieve this, we occasionally need information about you when you visit our Web site.
The information you submit is only shared with third parties if it is necessary to complete your request, provide you with access to downloadable software, or as required by law.
Within our website, you may be asked to give us personal or organisational information in order to receive information about a product or service.
We use these statistics to improve our website, to monitor its performance, and to make it easier for you and other visitors to use.
